data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Uttaradit to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Uttaradit, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Uttaradit, Thailand.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 504,422 lost people in  Uttaradit, Thailand have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Uttaradit, Thailand. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Tai Wang people.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Uttaradit, Thailand to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 3,305 believers in Uttaradit, Thailand to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.section_summary:
the state of Uttaradit, Thailand has a population of 511,100.

We estimate Uttaradit has 3,305 people who might know Jesus, 3,374 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 504,422 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Over 98.69 percent of the people of Uttaradit are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
